meanings.def: when you first look at or think about something, often rather quickly
examples: At first glance the problem seemed easy.
At first glance the contract seemed to be fine.

meanings.def: immediately; with only a quick look
examples: He could tell at a glance what was wrong.
The software allows you to see at a glance what fonts you have on the computer.
